public class SerializableApplicationTask<T>
extends Object

A serializable wrapper for an ApplicationTask.

Constructor.

Parameters:
applicationName - The full name of the Restlet application in which this task will execute
documentName - The document name
entryPointName - The entry point name or null
context - The context made available to the task
